open-selected-url-in-new-tab.description: Open new tab when a URL is selected

open-selection-in-new-tab.description: Open new tab using selected text as a link

open-selection.description: Follow selected text as a link

help.description: Open help page and also help page title

prefs-editmenu.description: Select to edit the custom menu

prefs-cancel.description: Cancel changes and close preferences without saving

prefs-apply.description: Apply changes but leave preferences open

prefs-list-tip.message: List of menu items. '*' is replaced by the selection.'--' is a separator. '|'separates menu label from URL to use

prefs-entry-tip.message: New menu item. '*' is replaced by the selection.'--' is a separator. '|' separates menu label from URL to use

urllink-help-title.description: Title of URL Link help page

urllink-changelog-title.description: Title of URL Link changelog page

prefs-newwindow.description: Open new window by default (as <Shift> normally does)

prefs-newwindow-tip.message: Open new window by default (as <Shift> normally does)
prefs-newwindow-tip.description: Open new window by default (as <Shift> normally does)

prefs-onlyurls.message: Only work when selection looks like a URL

prefs-editsandr.description: Select to edit the search and replace options

prefs-sandr-list-tip.message: List of search and replace items. Format is 'RegEx||Replacement'

prefs-sandr-entry-tip.message: New search and replace item. Format is 'RegEx||Replacement'

prefs-forcesubmenu-tip.message: Shows the extra sub-menu even if the current selection already looks like a valid URL

prefs-background-tabs-tip.message: Open new tabs in the background instead of switching to them
